subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: There is always plenty of blame to go around when a team loses in the playoffs. This postseason, some of that blame has been directed at Russian stars: Ilya Kovalchuk, Alexei Yashin, and Evgeni Malkin.
snippet: There is always plenty of blame to go around when a team loses in the playoffs. This postseason, some of that blame has been directed at Russian stars: Ilya Kovalchuk, Alexei Yashin, and Evgeni Malkin.
